```{r introduction, echo=FALSE, include=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

## load packages
library(nlme)
library(JMbayes)
library(splines)
    
## linear mixed effects model
lmeFit3 <- lme(CD4 ~ ns(obstime, 3) + ns(obstime, 3):drug, data = aids,
    random = list(patient = pdDiag(form = ~ ns(obstime, 3))))
summary(lmeFit3)



```
